price: Alif Laam Raa.[1] Iyo ni imirongo (ayat) y’igitabo, ikaba (n’imirongo ya) Qur’an isobanutse.
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: [1] Isura zitangirwa n’inyuguti nk’izi, twazivuzeho mu masura yatambutse, urugero Surat Al Baqarat.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
